name: tangling-hair
caption: Tangling Hair

effect.short: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.
effect.full: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.

flavorText:
Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s
Speed stat.
